description.ko: 보이지 않는 소리의 세계가 물리적인 형태를 갖추고, 대지의 먼지 속에 교향곡을 새깁니다.
description.en: The invisible world of sound takes physical form, carving symphonies into the very dust of the earth.

prompt: A geometric landscape of glowing sand forming complex 3D cymatic mandalas that ripple upward into pillars of crystalline fire and sapphire ice. Minimalist lines react to an invisible, powerful resonance, creating vibrating frequencies in the air. 8k, Octane Render, raytracing. The color palette shifts from intense orange (FF4500) to deep royal blue (4169E1). Cinematic lighting captures the sharp focus of individual sand grains suspended in mid-air by the force of the sound. Global illumination reflects the visual consonance of the vibrating architectural forms.
